p: Confluent monolayers of Vero cells were seeded in 12-well microplates and infected with a serial dilution of virus medium. Following a 2Â h infection period, the cells were overlaid with DMEM containing 1.5% methylcellulose and 2% FBS, and then incubated for two days. Viral fluorescence foci were visualized and counted using an inverted fluorescence microscope (Olympus CKX41).
